TopicTitle: KSP Facepalms TWO, now even palmier

Articles.Content:
I got SO many people saying "what about..." after the first video, so I made a second one, using a lot of the communities suggestions.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4O2tzDqaZeE
Love the video, there are some issues with frames though, not too bad, but seriously, "Denying impending doom" XD

Love the video, there are some issues with frames though, not too bad, but seriously, "Denying impending doom" XD

Thanks, I took so many people's idea from the forums and subreddit on the last one, so I thought, "why not make another?" and just did that while I was wasting around waiting for him to crash into the sun.
